title: Direction of Parabola
text: Since the sign of a is negative, the parabola opens downwards and has a maximum value.

title: Maximum Value
text: The first step in solving for the maximum value is to find the x-value of the vertex with the formula $$\frac{-b}{2} a$$.

title: Calculate x-value of vertex
text: What is the x-value of the vertex?

title: Find Maximum Value
text: To calculate the maximum value of the quadratic, plug in the x-value of the vertex into the equation for f.

title: Finding Range
text: The range is all possible output values. Since the parabola is downwards, all the values equal to or below the max value are within range.
